name: Rain And Red Roses
description:
- The Year Is 1968 -

Trying to sleep amid academic pressure, pretending to be alright, and a raging thunderstorm outside of your dorm room, all you have to do is get in bed and get some rest. If only your dreams would cooperate...

My entry for the Dream Diary Jam 4, which is a remake of my embarrassing DDJ2 entry. Made using Photoshop and RPG Maker 2003, with the YNFG template provided by the incredibly talented Clockwork Prince. More detailed credits can be found in both the game proper and the readme.txt file.

Featuring...
  • Roughly twenty to thirty minutes of gameplay in the weird, Alice in Wonderland and Sixties-inspired dreams and nightmares of Hargreaves, a troubled college student in denial of her troubledness.
  • Four (or more?) different effects that all affect gameplay and contribute to reaching new secrets and areas, default included.
  • Two different endings, a few minor events and interactivity, and nine different worlds to explore.
  • Drastically improved pixel art, and a significantly smaller file with virtually no load times or lag.

Thank you for checking out my game, and thank you to VitaliaDi and PhantomMat for beta testing it!
